root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 5-2-2, translated into en
root.data:
This indicator measures the percentage of women and girls, aged 15 or over (have ever experienced any form of formal or informal union), who have suffered physical, sexual or psychological violence from their current or former intimate partner, in the last 12 months .

According to the United Nations Declaration on the Elimination of Violence against Women (1993), Violence against Women is â€œAny act of gender-based violence that results or may result in physical, sexual or psychological harm or suffering to women, including threats of such acts, coercion or arbitrary deprivation of liberty, occurring in public or private life.
